homepage:
services:
  - name: Mealie
    logo: shakker/mealie.png
    categories:
      - My Apps
    type: custom
    description: A self hosted recipe manager, meal planner, and shopping list.
    url: https://demo.mealie.io
    auth: none
    icon: shakker/mealie.png
docs:
# About
Mealie is a self-hosted recipe manager, meal planner, and shopping list application. It features a REST API backend and a reactive frontend built in Vue. Users can add recipes by URL or manually, plan meals, and organize shopping lists.

# Prerequisites
- Docker installed on your server
- Sufficient storage for your recipes and data

# Installation
1. Clone the Mealie repository.
2. Navigate to the directory where you want to set up Mealie.
3. Use the provided Docker Compose snippet to deploy the application.

# Configuration
- Access the Mealie web interface via the configured port (default is 9925).
- Configure your recipes, meal plans, and shopping lists through the UI.
- For advanced configurations, refer to the [Mealie documentation](https://docs.mealie.io/).
compose:
services:
  mealie:
    image: ghcr.io/mealie-recipes/mealie:latest
    container_name: mealie
    ports:
      - "9925:80"
    volumes:
      - ${DATA_ROOT}/mealie/data:/app/data
      - ${DATA_ROOT}/mealie/config:/app/config
    environment:
      - TZ=UTC
    restart: unless-stopped
name: mealie
